thread.title: Lucky Travelzoo Member to Jet around the World in Celebration of Ten Millionth Local Deal
thread.title_full: Lucky Travelzoo Member to Jet around the World in Celebration of Ten Millionth Local Deal - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Lucky Travelzoo Member to Jet around the World in Celebration of Ten Millionth Local Deal
text:
Travelzoo Inc.
NEW YORK , Oct. 13, To celebrate its 10 millionth local deal, Travelzoo Inc. (NASDAQ: TZOO), a global Internet media company, will send one lucky member and a companion on a once-in-a-lifetime wine, dine and spa tour of New York , London and Hong Kong .
Since launching local deals in 2010, Travelzoo has expanded the offering to more than 100 cities in 11 countries. Approximately 12,000 top-quality restaurants, spas and activity companies offer Travelzoo members exclusive local deals that are available online and via the Travelzoo app. Travelzoo local deals receive high marks: 783,000 members give the deals and merchants 92% approval rating.
"Local deals started five years ago with the idea we could help our members find great deals in their local cities, but increasingly, our members are using local deals via our app when they visit a new city," said Mike Stitt , president of Travelzoo North America. "The around-the-world wine, dine and spa tour is an exciting and fun way to celebrate our success with millions of members around the world."
Travelzoo deal experts in New York , London and Hong Kong will greet the winners with cheer at the airport before whisking them off to a 5-star hotel and giving them access to Travelzoo's local deals in each city. The winner and companion will receive a GoPro HERO camera to document the once-in-a-lifetime trip.
To enter, simply complete the form at www.travelzoo.com/blog/aroundtheworld .
About Travelzoo
Travelzoo Inc. is a global Internet media company. With more than 27 million members in North America , Europe , and Asia Pacific and 26 offices worldwide, TravelzooÂ® publishes deals from more than 2,000 travel, entertainment and local companies. Travelzoo's deal experts review offers to find the best deals and confirm their true value.
